EmailTemplate.description: To be used for informing customer on how to get access to research entitlements
EmailTemplate.name: Markit Hub - access to new research entitlements
EmailTemplate.subject: Markit Hub - access to new research entitlements
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
You already have an active Markit Hub account and details of which are further provided below:
Username: {!Case.ContactEmail__c} You are already entitled to : <list all research providers entitled>
All correspondence in relation to your Markit Hub account will be sent to the email address registered to your profile, {!Case.ContactEmail__c}.
To get access to <list of all research providers required> research via Markit Hub, please send an email to each entitlement firm's support team requesting them to enable their content for your profile. Please also copy in that email, a sales sponsor (your contact person in the bank whose research you wish to access).
The Markit Hub platform provides third-party unified access to multiple research providers, who are common customers with IHSMarkit. The content is managed direcly by each research provider and not by Markit Hub.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
